body: It's a common trope, dude is a scumbag then gets gender bended by a futanari due to not liking the dude and ducks the dude

huh i really ranted sorry 🤷‍♂️

Whew i came back and reflected using my post nut brain.So let me starts a little rant here:

I'm not gonna say shit like "he didnt deserve it" or "he deserved every second of it" because honestly both arguments are messed up and don't take humanity or lack of it in the equation. Yes it was terrible of him to force her to do the things he wanted ('force' 'cause they weren't dating) and that he did this with out cossidering her opinions or feelings. But when you put it like that the girl did the same thing just out of spite. Does this make what she did any better? No. Because of the simple fact of the matter that there both terrible people. I have no doubt from what ive seen both sides are terrible people with even worse personalities that will probably use everyone and anyone to get what they want regardless of morals and maybe... just.... MAYBE i would like to see them make up if the author made another one. I can imagine both making up after the girl cools down over her revenge high.
I wish there a another one of this😍

If you don't care about your partner's feelings during sex, you deserve what he gets in this manga. The number of women that actually orgasm during sex is so low, I highly doubt any of the people who come to this website have made a girl actually cum.

Maybe this is too much to expect from a hentai, but the how and why he's changed into a woman isn't explained.  I don't get why he deserved to get raped and then gangbanged either.  Being a "womanizer" is not good enough.
The guy may be a douche but at least he didn't cheat on her. Oh well, "she's" cute tho.
